name: ggplot2 - basics II
description: Last week we learned the basic building blocks of ggplot2. Today we will follow up and also look into how plot data through maps.
teaser: Learn more about ggplot2 and how to map data)

details.Prerequisites: Be curious - some R knowledge helps
